paper.title: On the estimation of commodity market risk premium under price limits
paper.abstract: This paper extends the estimation of market risk premium under price limits in two important directions. The first is to provide estimates of systematic risk for Canadian commodities futures (western barley, canola, flaxseed, feed wheat) using a market portfolio based on a similar weighting scheme suggested by Marcus (1984). The second is to estimate systematic risk with the induction of price limits in the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM) and the deployment of a fuzzy regression method.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究在价格限制条件下对商品市场风险溢价的估计，并使用了CAPM和模糊回归方法来估计系统性风险，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
